arts.ttl: Official: Real Betis confirm Barcelona star Vitor Roque’s departure
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Real Betis have on Friday announced the immediate departure of striker Vitor Roque. This comes ahead of the youngster’s imminent return to Brazil, with Palmeiras. Roque’s name…

arts.ttl: Confirmed: Barcelona sell Vitor Roque on permanent deal
arts.sum: La Liga giants Barcelona have reached an agreement over the permanent sale of on-loan striker Vitor Roque. That’s according to transfer insider Fabrizio Romano, who has on Thursday evening confirmed…
